title: [Feature Request] Dynamic Connection Folder pulls connection list via REST
author: jerry-bonner
body_snippet:
Description
A folder type that would pull (sync) a list of connections from a remote REST/JSON API, either periodically or on-demand. This feature would also support a sub-folder hierarchy.

Use Case
An organization may have hundreds of hosts that are maintained in separate databases. There is a need to rapidly distribute updates to these lists to end users that would be exported from these systems.

comments.author: sajalshres
comments.snippet: We have rest services in our organization which maintain records of our hosts. It would be super useful to have this feature. We currently use a PowerShell script to generate connections.
